title: Trofo
author: Trofo
content: We need an experienced BB code designer, please reply here or in PM with your portfolio if you are interested.JOB: Design of signatures for the campaign, Hero/Legendary and Senior Member, have to be done in about week after we agree on everything. Signatures have to be tested to work properly on different devices (PC, Mob..) and browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Edge...)Payment: we will agree on price in USD and payout will be in BTC as per current rate at the moment job is done and accepted.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: I sent Jayce a pm on telegram, https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1142066.0 here is a link to his portfolio. You're not gonna find anyone much better then him. He will give you a fair deal as well as get your designs done in a decent timeframe.

comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.body: Jayce is best. You can try him to get the best result.

comments.author: Trofo
comments.body: Thanks for the help guys. Jayce got the job so I am locking the thread.
